meanings.definition: A compound containing an ozonide group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied different ozonides in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Ozonides are important compounds in environmental chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The ozonides in the experiment seemed to dance under the UV light.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like the bond between ozonides - strong and unique.
meanings.sent5: The smell of ozonides filled the room, reminding him of his days in the lab.

meanings.definition: A salt or ester of an ozonic acid.
meanings.sent1: The chef added ozonides to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent2: The production of ozonides requires specific chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The ozonides in the recipe gave the soup an unexpected twist.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like ozonides, adding a special touch to her art.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset was like a painting with colors of ozonides in the sky.
